title: CMC-Based Science Writing Feedback Simulation Training

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science knowledge, comprehension of writing structures, and fundamental digital device operation skills
context.additional_context: A course where pre-service teachers perform science-themed writing tasks in VR environments, receiving peer and expert feedback. Simulation tools provide real-time interaction and anonymous feedback features.

learning_goals: Learners can compose a 500+ character essay that clearly conveys complex concepts in science topics.
Learners can provide feedback on peers' scientific writing across three dimensions—grammar, structure, and content—using CMC tools
Learners can improve their writing structuring ability by over 20% by analyzing expert feedback
Learners can perform at least three interactive feedback dialogues in VR-based simulations
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
